metadata.title: CVE-2024-26622 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tomoyo: fix UAF write bug in tomoyo_write_control()Since tomoyo_write_control() updates head->write_buf when write()of long lines is requested, we need to fetch head->write_buf afterhead->io_sem is held.  Otherwise, concurrent write() requests cancause use-after-free-write and double-free problems.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
